text: But Jehoshabeath, the daughter of the king, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him away from among the kingâ€™s sons who were being murdered, and put him and his nurse in a bedroom. So Jehoshabeath, the daughter of King Jehoram, the wife of Jehoiada the priest (for she was the sister of Ahaziah), hid him from Athaliah so that she did not kill him.
